text: The Merarites were assigned responsibility for the boards of the tabernacle, its bars, columns, pedestals, and all its fittings—and everything pertaining to their maintenance,
All the people noted this with approval, just as everything the king did met with their approval.
Hear, our God, how we were mocked! Turn back their reproach upon their own heads and deliver them up as plunder in a land of captivity!
He was to settle foreigners in all their territory and distribute their land by lot.
Before all he gave witness to the deeds of the most high God that he had seen with his own eyes.
Or subverts a person's lawsuit— does the Lord not see?
Such is our God; no other is to be compared to him:
To whom you promised to multiply their offspring like the stars of heaven, or the sand on the shore of the sea.
the son of Cainan, the son of Arphaxad, the son of Shem, the son of Noah, the son of Lamech,
Whoever believes in the Son has eternal life, but whoever disobeys the Son will not see life, but the wrath of God remains upon him.
